00029 #ifndef _RenderOperation_H__
00030 #define _RenderOperation_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreVertexIndexData.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 
00037 
00039     class _OgrePrivate RenderOperation {
00040     public:
00042         enum OperationType {
00044             OT_POINT_LIST = 1,
00046             OT_LINE_LIST = 2,
00048             OT_LINE_STRIP = 3,
00050             OT_TRIANGLE_LIST = 4,
00052             OT_TRIANGLE_STRIP = 5,
00054             OT_TRIANGLE_FAN = 6
00055         };
00056 
00058         VertexData *vertexData;
00059 
00061         OperationType operationType;
00062 
00067         bool useIndexes;
00068 
00070         IndexData *indexData;
00072         const Renderable* srcRenderable;
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076         RenderOperation() :
00077             vertexData(0), operationType(OT_TRIANGLE_LIST), useIndexes(true),
00078                 indexData(0), srcRenderable(0) {}
00079 
00080 
00081     };
00082 }
